Grid integration.Description: Grid integration enables the integration of renewable energy sources into the existing power grid, allowing for the efficient utilization of clean energy.
Grid integration depends on the implementation of smart grid technologies, which enable the seamless integration of distributed energy resources and efficient management of the power grid.
Grid integration requires the use of energy storage systems to balance the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources and ensure a stable and reliable power supply.

Grid integration facilitates the integration of electric vehicles into the power grid, enabling vehicle-to-grid (V2G) technologies and the utilization of EV batteries for grid balancing and energy storage.
